pinyin: ke4 hu4 fu2 wu4 qi4 jie2 gou4
ke4 hu4 ji1 fu2 wu4 qi4 huan2 jing4

sentences.chinese: 更新基于映像部署的客户机。

sentences.english: It delivers value more slowly to everyone. Invariably.
sentences.chinese: 这会让交付价值变得更慢，对所有客户都会变慢。

sentences.english: If no domain is registered, the money is refunded in full.
sentences.chinese: 如果客户没有注册任何域名，那么保证金将全部返还。

sentences.english: Implementing customer scenarios to include the flow of defect submissions expands integration coverage.
sentences.chinese: 包含缺陷交付流程的实施客户场景扩展了集成的范围。

sentences.english: The fact that you have control over all the clients helps.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，你能够控制所有客户的话是很有帮助的。

sentences.english: Have reached a shopping direction, sales and customers purchase contract signed.
sentences.chinese: 已达成购物方向后，销售人员和客户签署购销合同。

sentences.english: We sincerely hope of fully cooper-ate with old and new cutomers. to achieve mutual progress.
sentences.chinese: 同时诚望与各新老客户通力合作，共同拓展。

sentences.english: The colorful pocket in the front can change the color as customer require.
sentences.chinese: 前面彩色的裁片可根据客户的要求更换颜色。

sentences.english: It is the customer's responsibility to close out hedges if they wish to do so.
sentences.chinese: 这是客户的责任来将锁单平仓，如果他们愿意这么做。

sentences.english: Most customers are from Shanxi and Erduosi (Inner Momgolia).
sentences.chinese: 大多数客户来自山西及内蒙鄂尔多斯。

sentences.english: The key account manager must possess significant skill to run a multi-million dollar business.
sentences.chinese: 大客户经理须具备经营数百万美元生意的重要技能。

sentences.english: Any deletion or amendment must be initialed by all account holders.
sentences.chinese: 任何删除或修改必须由客户签署作实。

sentences.english: Many clients had been let in.
A client for the service comes preinstalled with current Eseries models.
sentences.chinese: 提供有效的服务客户预装在目前的E系列机型。

sentences.english: Reduce the set cost of customers and increase the after-sales service guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 减少客户的成套成本，增加售后服务保证。

sentences.english: We are doing fine, meeting the customers' needs.
sentences.chinese: 挺好的，满脚了客户的需求。
